titleStmt.title: A strange relation of the suddain and violent tempest, which happened at Oxford May 31, Anno Domini 1682 together with an enquiry into the probable cause and usual consequents of such like tempests and storms.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Robert, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Harrison. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
